README:
Annotation Graph Library
========================
  
http://agtk.sf.net/
  
This library package contains a C++ implementation of the Annotation
Graph API, a database interface, and file I/O plugins for several
existing annotation formats.  Wrappers are included which permit the
libraries to be accessed from Tcl/tk, Python and Java.
  
The AG library implements the annotation graph model [1].
  
For installation instructions, please see doc/index.html.
  
[1] Steven Bird & Mark Liberman (2001).  A formal framework
    for linguistic annotation.  Speech Communication 33, 23-60.
    http://www.arXiv.org/abs/cs/0010033
